name: project-6
description: Pull the front-end app code from [this project repo](https://github.com/OpenClassrooms-Student-Center/Web-Developer-P6) and take the following steps: 1. Clone repo 2. Open a terminal (Linux/Mac) or command prompt/PowerShell (Windows) 3. Run npm install from within the project directory 4. Run npm start 5. Run your API on http://localhost:3000
